definition: to be out of (political) office/to be out of power
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: We also urge opposition parties to present their manifestoes to voters as early as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们还敦促在野党尽早发布他们对选民的政治宣言。

sentences.english: Birds rest in wild verdure where dusk forgets Qin's courts of yore;
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿栖息在野绿之中，此处的黄昏遗忘了古代的秦苑。

sentences.english: The opposition Democratic Progressive Party, which Chen once led, has urged the government to free him immediately.
sentences.chinese: 在野党民进党，陈曾经领导过，敦促政府立即释放他。

sentences.english: In the brotherhood of gamins, a memorable accident counts for a great deal.
sentences.chinese: 在野孩群里，凡是难忘的意外都是极受重视的。

sentences.english: Exit polls in Portugal suggest the centre-right opposition Social Democrats have won the general election.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄牙选后测验称，在野社会民主党赢得了大选。

sentences.english: "I've had candidates ask if they can work part-time from home right off the bat, " Ms.
sentences.chinese: 有些应聘者一开端就答他们能不能在野上班。

sentences.english: For the minority, the gravest threat to the stability of the Republic.
sentences.chinese: 对于在野党来说，它是对国家稳定的最严重威胁。

sentences.english: I have seen dawn and sunset on moors and windy hills.
sentences.chinese: 我曾在野风呼啸的山地观看日落和晨曦。

sentences.english: How was it able to form and survive successfully without real challenges from the opposition parties?
sentences.chinese: 在野党为什么没有能够成功地提出不信任案？

sentences.english: In particular, he wants collaboration with opposition parties mostly bent on ousting him.
sentences.chinese: 特别地，他希望能和决意令他下台的在野党合作。

definition: Ueno, district in Taitō Ward, Tokyo/Ueno (Japanese surname)
to step down from office/to go into opposition
秦越人[Qin2 Yue4 ren2] (407-310 BC), Warring States physician known for his medical skills, nicknamed Bian Que after the earliest known Chinese physician allegedly from the 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4] era
to go against the wind/contrary wind/a headwind
to arrest/to capture/to seize/to win (a set, a game etc)
Xinzhu or Hsinchu County in northwest Taiwan
